name: tradecast-wordpress
description: A Wordpress plugin for adding Tradecast content to your site.

scripts.build: yarn build:admin && yarn build:front-end && yarn build:gallery-block && yarn build:video-block
scripts.install:all: yarn install --check-files && yarn install:admin && yarn install:front-end && yarn install:gallery-block && yarn install:video-block && yarn link:library
scripts.link:library: cd src/vue-library && yarn link > /dev/null && cd ../vue-admin && yarn link @tradecast/library && cd ../vue-front-end && yarn link @tradecast/library
scripts.unlink:library: cd src/vue-library && yarn unlink > /dev/null && cd ../vue-admin && yarn unlink @tradecast/library && cd ../vue-front-end && yarn unlink @tradecast/library
